scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
scripts.build: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output-style compressed --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css' && postcss 'static/css/**/*.css'
scripts.lint-py: poetry run flake8 webapp templatefinder && black --check --line-length 79 webapp templatefinder
scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-py && yarn run test-py
